You are trapped in some sort of dark room… There is a door on your left, some sort of urn in the corner, a closet, and a window.\nWhat will you do?
The door seems to be locked… Perhaps there is a key nearby?
You insert the key and turn it. The door becomes unlocked, and you proceed to the next room. Oddly, the key vanishes into thin air…
Though it looked promising, the closet doesn\'t contain anything of note. In fact, it seems there is nothing at all inside.
You look out of the window, but it\'s pitch black outside.
You shake the urn and hear something moving within. You then turn the urn upside down, and a key falls out.
You already checked the urn.
You are now in a somewhat lit hallway… There is a painting on the wall, another window,\nand some kind of button. What will you do?
You continue further down the hall.
Looking out the window, you can faintly see a courtyard. Nothing else of note.
You investigate the button, but it\'s old and rusted. Pressing it has no result.
The painting is just a plain picture of a meadow. Curious, you remove it from the wall.\nBehind it is a note that says \"r1b1g0\". Perhaps you should note this down.
You proceed down the hall, and find a strange room with 3 buttons, red, green, and blue, and a large door.
The door refuses to open.
You manage to open the door...
You press the red button, causing it to light up.
You press the red button again, shutting its light off.
You press the blue button, causing it to light up.
You press the blue button again, shutting its light off.
You press the green button, causing it to light up.
You press the green button again, shutting its light off.
